description:
Enable users to export filtered datasets and reports in common formats. Implement server-side generation using Effect pipelines with streaming for large datasets. Support scheduled exports via the job queue and email delivery with presigned download URLs.

**Rationale:** Users need to analyze data in external tools or share reports with stakeholders. Export functionality is a baseline expectation in data-driven applications, especially for business intelligence and compliance reporting.

title: Data export to multiple formats (CSV, JSON, PDF)
